creator: One Tap Studio
descriptionHtml:
Pong Master is not classic ping pong game, it’s amazing physical puzzle game with unique game play. Troll the bad stickman. Be a pong master.
Now you are thinking about Beer Pong, right? Pong Master is even more awesome.
A game that combines many unique ways of playing. You have found a game with a unique way of playing - Pong Master.

Beat the level in 3 different ways:
- Drag to shoot pong into the cups
- Use colorful pongs to break the glasses, troll the bad stickman.
- Collect all stars by a pong trick shot.

How to play:
- Control the colorful pongs to solve ping pong puzzles.
- The challenge will be harder when the cups change positions or you will have to get the whole stars.

FEATURE:
-Simple to control, free to play.
- You don't have wifi? No problem. You can completely play Pong Master even when offline
- Suitable for all ages
- Challenging trick shot

Easy to pick up, hard to put down with Pong Master.
Please share with us about your experience. We always listen to user feedback to improve the game better.
descriptionShort: Drag to throw ping pong balls into the cup. A newest pong trick shot game.
